localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: With code-ray you can fix bugs in your code faster and easier. You can set breakpoints to show the live state in different sections of your code. code-ray can be linked to GitHub, GitLab and Bitbucket. There is a permanently free version.
blogPost.body: With code-ray you can fix bugs in your code faster and easier. You can set breakpoints to show the live state in different sections of your code. code-ray can be linked to GitHub, GitLab and Bitbucket. There is a permanently free version.
blogPost.title: code-ray - Live debugging tool for software developers
blogPost.author: Henry Burkert

localize.description: 有了code-ray，你可以更快、更容易地修复代码中的bug，你可以设置断点来显示不同部分的实时状态。你可以设置断点来显示代码中不同部分的实时状态。code-ray可以链接到GitHub、GitLab和Bitbucket。有一个永久免费的版本。
localize.tagline: 软件开发人员的实时调试工具

localize.description: 有了code-ray，你可以更快、更容易地修復代碼中的bug，你可以設置斷點來顯示不同部分的實時狀態。你可以設置斷點來顯示代碼中不同部分的實時狀態。code-ray可以鏈接到GitHub、GitLab和Bitbucket。有一個永久免費的版本。
localize.tagline: 軟件開發人員的實時調試工具

previous.excerpt: Do you miss working in an office? Listen to the sounds of the hit TV show The Office! Check out the product that went viral on reddit with 24K site visits in 2 days 🔥
previous.title: Work at Dunder Mifflin - The Office TV show ambient sounds

localize.description: 你怀念在办公室工作的日子吗？听听热播电视剧《办公室》的声音吧！这款产品在reddit上获得了2天24K的网站访问量。看看这款产品在reddit上的病毒式传播，2天内有24K的网站访问量🔥。
localize.tagline: 办公室电视节目的环境声音

localize.description: 你懷念在辦公室工作的日子嗎？聽聽熱播電視劇《辦公室》的聲音吧！這款產品在reddit上獲得了2天24K的網站訪問量。看看這款產品在reddit上的病毒式傳播，2天內有24K的網站訪問量🔥。
localize.tagline: 辦公室電視節目的環境聲音
